name: Ubuntu SSH
short_description: Ubuntu Linux container with OpenSSH server — connect via SSH as root using a configurable password.
description: Ubuntu Linux container with OpenSSH server — connect via SSH as root using a configurable password. Ubuntu SSH is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, password-manager, security. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Ubuntu SSH on your home server to ubuntu linux container with openssh server — connect via ssh as root using a configurable password without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Ubuntu SSH to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
